lead_paragraph: A Wisconsin entrepreneur wants to roll tire design into the 21st century, tipping tires and wheels at a slight angle for improved ride, lateral traction and tread life.
snippet: A Wisconsin entrepreneur wants to roll tire design into the 21st century, tipping tires and wheels at a slight angle for improved ride, lateral traction and tread life.

headline.main: Tucking In Tires at the Top to Improve Traction, Ride and Mileage
headline.print_headline: Tucking In Tires at the Top to Improve Traction, Ride and Mileage
